publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-784 Donald Gorrie: The Scottish Football Writers' Association-That the Parliament welcomes the change of heart by the Scottish Football Writers' Association to admit female guests to its annual dinner.

S2M-784 Donald Gorrie: The Scottish Football Writers' Association-That the Parliament welcomes the change of heart by the Scottish Football Writers' Association to admit female guests to its annual dinner.
S2M-784 The Scottish Football Writers' Association (lodged on 13 January 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, John Swinburne*
S2M-784 The Scottish Football Writers' Association (lodged on 13 January 2004) Christine Grahame*
